mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GUESTBOOK (id, blogId, displayId, writerId, contents, dateCreated) VALUES (#{id}, #{blog.id}, #{displayId}, #{writer.loginId}, #{contents}, #{dateCreated})
mapper.select: SELECT id FROM guestbook WHERE blogId = #{blogId} ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.sql: SELECT g.id as id, g.blogId as "blog.id", g.displayId as displayId, g.writerId as "writer.loginId", g.contents as contents, g.dateCreated as dateCreated FROM guestbook g
